function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Person-to-person transmission due to overcrowded hospitals","Impact":"Spread of COVID-19 and strain on healthcare resources","Mitigation":"Implement advanced technological solutions for patient care and remote monitoring","Technologies":"Tele-response bots, 5G networks, drones for medication delivery, work-from-home apps","People":"Healthcare staff, patients, general public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Shortage of ventilators and medical supplies","Impact":"Inadequate treatment for COVID-19 patients and strain on healthcare resources","Mitigation":"Increase production capacity, regulatory flexibility, and diversify manufacturing efforts","Technologies":"Automation, advanced manufacturing processes, regulatory fast-tracking","People":"Healthcare staff, medical equipment manufacturers, government agencies","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, medical equipment manufacturers, government agencies"}]}
